heading: snl goes on web, webtv
subheading: nbc's saturday night cavalcade launches a site with made-for-the-web content and announces plans to be the network's first show on webtv's interactive tv platform.
author: wired news report
text: live from new that'll be the plug this week as beginning with this week's show, webtv users will be able to participate in a number of live, interactive features. while sketches unfold, viewers will be able to chat with other fans, play games based on the show's characters, participate in polls, and receive extra content about the guest host and musical guest.nbc digital productions has participated in other interactive television platforms such as intel's intercast and wink communications' enhanced programming.meantime monday, nbc unveiled snl online also will sell ads and
